Contributing¶

We ❤️ contributions! Follow these guidelines to make contributing smooth for everyone.

How to Contribute¶

  1. Fork the repository on GitHub.

  2. Clone your fork locally:

    git clone https://github.com/yourusername/justdial-lead-generator.git
cd justdial-lead-generator

  3. Create a new branch for your feature or bugfix:

    git checkout -b feature/my-new-feature

  4. Make your changes: - Follow PEP 8 style guidelines. - Add/update docstrings for public functions. - Include tests if adding new features.

  5. Run tests to make sure everything works:

    pytest

  6. Commit and push your changes:

    git add .
git commit -m "Add feature: my new feature"
git push origin feature/my-new-feature

  7. Open a Pull Request describing your changes.

Code Style¶

  • Use black for formatting:

    black justdial_lead_generator

  • Use flake8 to check linting:

    flake8 justdial_lead_generator

Testing¶

We use pytest for unit testing. Tests are located under justdial_lead_generator/tests.

Run all tests:

pytest

Reporting Issues¶

If you encounter a bug or have a feature request: - Open an issue on GitHub. - Provide clear reproduction steps. - Suggest improvements if possible.

Community Guidelines¶

  • Be respectful and constructive.

  • Keep discussions technical and focused.

  • Remember that open-source is collaborative!

License¶

By contributing, you agree that your contributions will be licensed under the same license as this project.

justdial-lead-generator
